name: Okta Token Brand Demonstration
description: Demonstrate OAuth authorization servers with branded stub applications.

SESSION_SECRET.description: A secret key for session data.

SCOPES.description: OAuth scopes to request on login

BASE_URI.description: The URI which will be used to host the application

BRAND.description: The brand name to show in the app.

BRANDING_CSS.description: Absolute url to branding css file.

TOKEN_AUD.description: The AUD claim of the user token.
